original_title: Former Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella questioned by the CID
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Criminal Investigation Department (CID) is currently questioning former Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella regarding a controversial drug transaction.
The interrogation began at 9 a.m. this morning and is currently going on.
Files related to the case, including those seized from the office of the Additional Secretary of the Health Ministry Saman Ratnayake, have been forwarded to the Government Analyst's Department.
The chieftain or the main ‘kapu mahatha’ of the Kataragama Maha Devalaya, arrested by the Colombo Crimes Division.
Kudu Roshan and others were arrested by the ‘Yukthiya’ operation
Immunoglobulin Probe Intensifies: Former Health Secretary & Key Figures in Court
